trans-unit.source: A collection of statistical tests of stationarity and seasonality
trans-unit.target: Сборник статистических тестов стационарности и сезонности

trans-unit.source: A rich collection of built-in time series datasets for prototyping and examples
trans-unit.target: Богатая коллекция встроенных наборов данных временных рядов для создания прототипов и примеров.

trans-unit.source: All of your questions and more (including examples and guides) can be answered by the pmdarima documentation. If not, always feel free to file an issue.
trans-unit.target: All of your questions and more (including examples and guides) can be answered by the pmdarima documentation. If not, always feel free to file an issue.

trans-unit.target: Однако это не рекомендуется.

trans-unit.source: If a wheel doesn't exist for your platform, you can still pip install and it will build from the source distribution tarball, however you'll need cython>=0.29 and gcc (Mac/Linux) or MinGW (Windows) in order to build the package from source.
trans-unit.target: If a wheel doesn't exist for your platform, you can still pip install and it will build from the source distribution tarball, however you'll need cython>=0.29 and gcc (Mac/Linux) or MinGW (Windows) in order to build the package from source.

trans-unit.source: Numerous endogenous and exogenous transformers and featurizers, including Box-Cox and Fourier transformations
trans-unit.target: Многочисленные эндогенные и экзогенные трансформаторы и феуризаторы,включая трансформации Бокс-Кокса и Фурье

trans-unit.source: Pmdarima (originally pyramid-arima, for the anagram of 'py' + 'arima') is a statistical library designed to fill the void in Python's time series analysis capabilities. This includes:
trans-unit.target: Pmdarima (originally pyramid-arima , for the anagram of 'py' + 'arima') is a statistical library designed to fill the void in Python's time series analysis capabilities. This includes:

trans-unit.source: Pmdarima has binary and source distributions for Windows, Mac and Linux (manylinux) on pypi under the package name pmdarima and can be downloaded via pip:
trans-unit.target: Pmdarima has binary and source distributions for Windows, Mac and Linux ( manylinux ) on pypi under the package name pmdarima and can be downloaded via pip :

trans-unit.source: Pmdarima wraps statsmodels under the hood, but is designed with an interface that's familiar to users coming from a scikit-learn background.
trans-unit.target: Pmdarima wraps statsmodels under the hood, but is designed with an interface that's familiar to users coming from a scikit-learn background.

trans-unit.source: Python's forecast::auto.arima equivalent
trans-unit.target: Прогноз Python::auto.arima эквивалент

trans-unit.target: Краткий обзор Примеры

trans-unit.target: наукоемкие трубопроводы для консолидации ваших оценщиков и продвижения производства

trans-unit.source: Seasonal time series decompositions
trans-unit.target: разложения сезонных временных рядов

trans-unit.source: The equivalent of R's auto.arima functionality
trans-unit.target: The equivalent of R's auto.arima functionality

trans-unit.target: Утилиты временных рядов,такие как дифференциация и обратное дифференцирование
